Articles.Content:
Hey there

 

I had Mechjeb 2 working for about a day, but now i cant get the pop-up tab on the lef to open to access the windows.

It was working fine before.

 

Yes i have the latest versions of both the mod and game

Yes i placed the little thingy on my ship

No i dont have any other mods installed
has steam auto updated you to 1.2 without you knowing?

When you mean last version, do you mean MJ 2.5.8 for KSP 1.1.3 or the latest MJ build #641 on KSP 1.2?

Also, for better visibility, ask a mod to move your thread where it needs to be and lastly, you may need to provide the necessary logs:
